title: Chapter 1868 - A Lonely Warrior
body:
Chapter 1868 - A Lonely Warrior

The prison was stifled. The atmosphere was silent and oppressive.

Even the Sovereign of Sin, an unparalleled expert within the Great Profound Stage, was a bit hesitant. Just what terrifying things had that young Immortal King prepared for them outside the prison? Would they meet with disaster the moment they emerged? None of them could answer, and none of them wanted to be the first to risk themselves.

But Su Yi was a bit impatient. He sighed. “Relax. If I wanted to kill you through trickery and external power, you'd have died the day I first opened the prison door.”

The Sovereign of Sin said gravely, “My young friend, why did you suddenly make this decision? What are you after?”

“I’m here to sever our enmities and determine life and death,” said Su Yi. “If you don’t believe me, you’re welcome to emerge one at a time. I promise not to attack until you’ve all exited the prison.”

His words were forthright and open, and seemed incomparably magnanimous.

The old monsters couldn’t help but hesitate. Could it be that… we’ve jumped to conclusions?
